author: Martin Brinkmann
title: Ghacks Deals: Mobile Security: How to Secure, Privatize, and Recover Your Devices (free ebook)
text:
Living in a mobile world. Users and mobile device management. Privacy -- Small word, big consequences. Mobile and social -- The threats you should know about. Protecting your mobile devices. Baby boomers, teens and tweens. Getting your life back after you've been hacked. Appendix 1: IBM Notes Traveler. Appendix 2: Mobile Device Management. Appendix 3:Tips to help you protect your mobile device. Appendix 4:Mobile Acceptable Use Policy Template. Appendix 5:The history of social networking, the Internet, and smartphones. 
Please note that you do need a free account no the Tradepub website to claim the ebook. Creating the account is free, but you will be asked to provide certain work related information. 
Check out other free ebooks, magazines or technical documents on the main TradePub website . Please share this article About Martin Brinkmann Martin Brinkmann is a journalist from Germany who founded Ghacks Technology News Back in 2005. He is passionate about all things tech and knows the Internet and computers like the back of his hand. You can follow Martin on Facebook , Twitter or Google+
